name: The North Face Gotham Parka - Women's
description:
Quilt-like warmth for cold winter days. The Gotham Down parka is ready for blustery winter weather. Baffles of lightweight goose down wrap your body in channels of coziness. While a lightweight polyester shell stops winter winds in their tracks.  With the added parka length and insulated hood, the Gotham offers excellent coverage from harsh winter weather.550-fill power goose down provides pillowy warmth.Down insulation is Responsible Down Certified, so you can feel good about your down.Insulated hood over an insulated collar offers extra protection from the cold.2 zippered side pockets for keeping hands warm and must-haves safe.2-way zipper lets you adjust your temperature without exposing your upper body to the elements.Lined with a smooth polyester for easy layering.Stretchy elastic cuffs with thumb loops, help the warm in and the cold out.

        Sustainability












                      Certified Responsible Down
